cards.title: Captain Cain
powers: {CaptainCain} deals 1 target 1 infernal damage. If {Fist} is active, {CaptainCain} deals that target 1 melee damage. If {Blood} is active, {CaptainCain} regains 1 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
One player may play a card.
Each hero may deal themself 1 toxic damage. Any who take damage this way each deal 1 target 1 infernal damage.

openingLines.default: nobody's more up to the task of your defeat than [b]Captain Cain![/b]

cards.title: All In!
body: {CaptainCain} deals 1 target 3 melee damage. That target deals {CaptainCain} 2 melee damage.

activatableAbilities.name: {Fist}:
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCain} may deal up to 2 additional targets 1 melee damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood}:
activatableAbilities.text: When {CaptainCain} would take damage, he regains that many HP instead.

cards.flavorText: “You pack a surprising left hook{BR}for a pile of melty rubber, chum.”

cards.title: Double Enhancer-Gloves
body: increase damage dealt by {CaptainCain} by 1.
powers: {Fist}: increase the next damage dealt by {CaptainCain} by 2. Play 1 card.
{Blood}: the next time {CaptainCain} would deal damage to a hero target, that target regains that many HP instead.
cards.flavorText: “with these, nobody could suspect{BR}me of being...more than human.”

cards.title: Endless Hunger
body: When this card enters play, destroy all of your [u]fist[/u] cards in play. When this card is destroyed, you may move a [u]blood[/u] card from your trash to your hand.
Treat {Blood} effects as active.
increase HP recovery by {CaptainCain} by 1.

cards.title: Heartflow Inducer
body: When you play an ongoing card from your hand, you may draw a card.
powers: your ongoing cards are indestructible while this power resolves. Play 1 card.
cards.flavorText: “don't overdo it.{BR}I cannot guarantee the results.”

cards.title: In the Nick of Time!
body: When this card enters play, destroy all of your [u]blood[/u] cards in play. When this card is destroyed, you may destroy an ongoing card.
Treat {Fist} effects as active.
When a hero target would be dealt damage, you may redirect the damage to {CaptainCain}.

cards.title: It's Just a Scratch!
body: When this card enters play, destroy all of your [u]fist[/u] cards in play. When this card is destroyed, {CaptainCain} regains 3 HP.
Treat {Blood} effects as active.
When {CaptainCain} drops to 0 or fewer HP, restore {CaptainCain} to 10 HP. Then, move this card to the bottom of your deck.

cards.title: Man of Action!
body: {CaptainCain} deals 1 target 2 melee damage, then deals a second target melee damage equal to the amount of damage dealt to the first target.

activatableAbilities.name: {Fist}:
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCain} may deal a third target projectile damage equal to the amount of damage dealt to the second target.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood}:
activatableAbilities.text: When a target is destroyed this way, you may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: “a fascinating strategy,{BR}striking one copy of Murk with another.”

cards.title: Man of the People
body: When this card enters play, destroy all of your [u]blood[/u] cards in play. When this card is destroyed, another player may play a card.
Treat {Fist} effects as active.
The first time each turn you draw a card, another player may draw a card.
cards.flavorText: “Working through the night,{BR}the mysterious hero rebuilt the{BR}shelter on his own!”

cards.title: No More Tricks...
body: {CaptainCain} deals himself and 1 other target 2 irreducible psychic damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood}:
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCain} deals that target 1 infernal damage, then regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Patented De-Solidifier
body: reduce damage dealt to {CaptainCain} by 1.
powers: {Blood}: The next time damage would be dealt to {CaptainCain}, prevent it. Until then, {CaptainCain} cannot deal damage.
cards.flavorText: “turn to mist?{BR}don't be silly.{BR}it's just science.”

cards.title: Two-Fisted Justice!
body: {CaptainCain} deals up to 5 targets 1 melee damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood}:
activatableAbilities.text: each time a target takes damage this way, {CaptainCain} regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Vampire Prince
body: When this card enters play, destroy all of your [u]fist[/u] cards in play. When this card is destroyed, reveal the top card of each Hero deck and either discard it or replace it.
Treat {Blood} effects as active.
You may draw an extra card during your draw phase.
cards.flavorText: “Ah, Cristian. you always were{BR}such a sentimental fool.”

cards.title: You've Made Me Mad, Buster!
body: When this card enters play, destroy all of your [u]blood[/u] cards in play. When this card is destroyed, {CaptainCain} deals each non-hero target 1 melee damage.
Treat {Fist} effects as active.
You may use an additional power during your power phase.
